messages.message:
@avi We are experimenting an MS Lite version, don't have any results yet but will see it it can help!
cc: @jayasooryan @Sławek Biel
maybe we should try and target business school students

Perhaps we could add a popup suggesting advanced in either of these scenarios:
• A long document has been uploaded
• After each response, there's a prompt for the user to :+1: or :-1: the response.  When :-1: is picked and the standard model was used, we can suggest the user try the same prompt using the advanced model (with a link that autopopulates an advanced prompt window with the prompt in question).
...the 2nd option also allows us to start collecting feedback on user satisfaction at a response-level.
